author: Saint Ghost
text: Been to this gym for quite some time now actually. Solid place + good music, cant complain. Indeed very convenient! All the staffs there were pretty friendly and helpful with my questions regarding about fitness. Anyway, many thank you staff Shahrezan for your hard work in helping me figuring out which equipment to use for certain workout. No issues with cleanliness, should come by! ‚ù§Ô∏è

author: Rat Chef
text:
I've been a member of Anytime Fitness for a while now, and there is an increasing amount of people wearing completely inappropriate footwear. I've seen multiple members working out in sandals, slides, and slip-ons, which is not only unsafe but also against basic gym etiquette.

Proper footwear is essential for safety and support, yet it seems like no one is enforcing this rule. It would be great if the staff could step up and ensure that everyone follows basic gym dress codes.

author: Wong Peiliang (Guy Wong)
text:
I went to this gym thrice over 3 weeks. This is my honest review after the 3 experiences & not 1 off. I really like to love this gym as it is closest to me, but it seriously needs a refresh and surgery! This is the 2nd oldest AF gym in SG, but they really didn't maintain it! Worst of all the AF gyms I have been to in SG so far.

Gym is really old and dirty. I honestly do not think that cleaning was done over these 3 weeks. My nose itches
when I am at dumbbell rack for extended period. Dirt and dust have gathered at corners of machines (photo of dust at Pec machine), thick layer of dust from aircon, dirt from dumbbell racks have not been cleaned since my 1st visit 3 weeks ago. Equipment has rusted or have seriously been used beyond point of replacement (see 9kg dumbbell, exposed plates and attachments). The weights barbell of the short barbells used for curls are also not labelled. Each barbell's weight was off and I had to measure via the weighing machine to conclude that 3 barbells weighed 6.4kg, 8kg and 12.8kg. another one rusted at side which I didn't bother.

Also have entitled old member (Saw him on 2 of the 3 times I went) that I saw bring up his personal bike to park inside the gym and once letting the community stray cat in, which terrified a female user and also caused stress for other users as we were worried of hurting it by accident.

Please give a thumbs up if you have a bad experience at this gym too so that the algorithm can push this review out more and help other people.

Thanks.

author: Lucien Lim
text: A well equipped branch of AF strategically located at MacPherson Community Club (3rd Floor). Some of the equipment is old/broken, but the gym is otherwise well-maintained and clean.

author: R J
text: Saw a bicycle parked inside the gym and everyone is either working out in slides, slippers or crocs. Given it‚Äôs late at night but there‚Äôs CCTV all around so maybe it‚Äôs just bad control from the management? Avoid at all cost !

author: Â≠îÈ¶ôÂë≥
text: The smallest one I‚Äôve ever been while there aren‚Äôt too many people. So it is ok lah

author: Gary Ang
text: Definitely one of the smallest AF out there, but that's the model of AF. This gym has been around for almost 10 years, it belongs to the pioneer of AF in Singapore. Equipment are well maintain, it has almost everything you need, and for such a small gym, I think it's really a good gym for the neighborhood.

author: MuhdNur Haziq
text: Shah is helpful and considerate. An asset to the company. Highly recommended.

author: Xyriz
text: Not a great experience with my trial session. Olympic bars are so old that the treads are smoothened out and rusting, olympic bars isn‚Äôt even that expensive to replace? Most foam and rubber grips on their machines have given up. Disappointed at the staff, they just went to their lair after I arrived and I only asked after more than 5 minutes of standing if I am waiting for something, apparently didn‚Äôt even think about showing me around and explaining the pricing, I had to tell them how to do their supposed job. Not sure maybe he is the owner and already swimming in money and don‚Äôt need my business. ü§£ I won‚Äôt workout here even if you pay me, sorry just relaying my experience!

author: N N
text: Gym was clean & organised. Staffs are well mannered, kind & helpful. I love the vibe there, awesome place to gym! Equipments are top notch too üëçüèΩ ‚Ä¶

author: sy
text: The gym lacks a female-friendly environment due to the absence of light-weight dumbbells and the poor condition of the available ones, some with torn rubber. Improvement in the dumbbell selection is crucial for safety and inclusivity, making the gym a more welcoming space for all members.

author: Aaron Thor
text:
I was a member here for years but shifted away, 2-3 years later I decided to visit old gym buddies and look at the ‚Äúrenovation‚Äù. Equipments are still usable even after years tho I wish the barbell could be new ones as the rust built up so much.
Dumbbells, machine equipments, plates are still good tho it‚Äôs super dusty which is a health and safety concern. Good old friends are still there which makes this place awesome as it was.

author: Mr Wang Wang
text:
Decent, expensive gym, no gym instructor or personnel to take charge of the gym most of the time. The gym users are so terrible, Usually on weekends those users keep dropping the weight on the floor after using.... Damaging the gym equipment and causing loud noise.

Edit: the Gym user keeps dropping the weight. Less than a star worth!

author: Suriyaprasad Vijayakumar
text:
Avergae gym with couple of rare equipments for legs  but sadly the toilet stinks very bad could smell the drainage through out the toilet.

Ps : Trainers could be friendly and welcoming to people visiting the gym. I visited today from 2pm till 5pm

author: Alex Sim
text:
Best AF outlet in the neighborhood because of the 3 extremely awesome hidden gems in the team, Shah, Lawrence and Kovin who make me look forward to walking through the door like your home, and always feel satisfaction when you leave.

Can't compare to other bigger outlet in the malls, but sufficient enough that feels more personal even during certain peak hours.
Incomparable to those commerical gym equipments but with innovative, never an issue for sure.
Staffs are extremely approachable.
Highly recommended!!!üëçüëç

Only down side to be avoid from personal experience, stench of body odors from certain members occasion walking pass, discomfort your training while the load is still on you!!!
We frequent this gym know when to avoid, not like some other outlets which so hard to predict such disastrous situation.ü§≠

author: Max Lim
text:
it has a very nice scent of body odor upon stepping into the gym you could feel the aroma scented towards you motivating you to work as quickly as possible.

The free weights are so well equipped some are not ragged and there is absolutely no dirt stain and cracks. The equipment's are all very well placed in an orderly manner such that no one will fall when walking.

The music motivates you to work slowly and steadily, last but not least they possible won the world best gym body odour in Singapore.

This sarcasm was written in a nice way as I sincerely hope the gym personnel will improve on the gym condition.

Regards,
Max

author: Clive Joseph
text:
Awesome environment, the staff like Shah here are very friendly and responsive,
equipments are good enough to cater to all the body parts.
Have decided to settle down as a gym due to the convenience of the place here and never looked back. üëçüèΩ ‚Ä¶

author: H Lee
text: Went there this morning and had a good workout as there was not much crowd quite well equipped for such a small gym. Staff(kevin) is very welcoming and friendly when he notice I seem "lost" looking for the changing room which is outside. Overall nice place and worth a visit if you are in the area for a quick workout

author: Daryle Dale De Silva
text: good neighborhood gym. happy that they renovated. might get a bit crowded during peak hours as the gym is small. if they expand further would be really nice. also need to add some more equipment like yoga ball, fixed weight barbells, etc

author: Clement Teh
text: This is the usual styling of most Anytime Fitness Gym. It is housed in a community club in Macpherson cc. The gym is small but is well equipped. There is a large glass window looking out to the townscape to give visual distance. The machines are well maintained. End user of Smith machine however, leaves parts strewn everywhere without thought that someone else may trip over them.

author: Muhammad Iskandar
text: Place is clean, doesn't smell, and all equipments are in good condition, place is not overly crowded, no problem so far during use :)

author: den
text: Relatively quiet, and serious gym people only! Clean and well maintained, although slightly dated.

author: Chong Yao Lim
text: Good gym with great equipment. Gym might be abit disorganised and overly filled with equipments but the best accessories and machines are available here. Great for experienced lifters but take note that there's no deadlifting floor board.

author: Nur Namera
text: Amazing facility, top equipment and great environment. Great place to workout with flexible timing. The staff are really awesome and helpful. I would highly recommend!

author: Tim Habelito
text: Quite difficult to find as the only sign on the gym is dim and hard to see from the street, also there are no street signs giving directions to the gym which is on the upper flr of the Community club. Gym is one of the smaller AF around with limited machines compared to other branches. No specific area/room for circuit training and stretching. wifi is not available to the public like most AF, only for staff. Able to get a decent workout though as all the standard equipment is there.

author: Zi Jie
text: Pretty decent gym that is opened 24 hours. Decent equipments and not much crowd. The only downside that it can be pricey and prices are always charged differently to different individuals. No standardisation.

author: zach
text: Amazing experience at McPherson AF, Linda was super helpful

author: Jake Poh
text: Small and cosy gym. Equipped with essentials but there is only one power rack. Shower/toilet facilities are available in the public restroom just across.

author: Jerome Ong
text: Small and crowded during peak hours. Can have 10 pax at most at any one time if not it'll be too crowded to workout comfortably.

author: AQ
text: Cleanliness is definitely an issue. Cockroaches spotting running around in the gym.

author: Lemongrab
text: Great place gym, friendly vibe from the community and very helpful staff. Props to Shah for welcoming me in!

author: Aeson
text: conveniently located just beside Mattar MRT and within Macpherson CC. Well maintained and cosy gym!

author: Reach (Boybabyrage)
text: The place is a bit compact for my taste. There were lack of benches. Other than that, are is fine. The plus thing is quiet and less crowded.

author: Johnathan Wong
text: Good carpark and well equipped although a little small compared to the other gyms they have.

author: Riyaas Aladdin
text: Bad customer service

author: Hamizan Ismail
text: Great gym and staff are very welcoming üëçüèº ‚Ä¶

author: Jasmine Yeo
text: Gym is well equipped and staff are friendly!

author: joey ng
text: I love the environment at AF Macpherson, amazing staffs & supportive members üëçüèªüëçüèª ‚Ä¶

author: Izwan Izam
text: Only lacking is the shower facility.  Else, all is good with friendly staffs and complete equipment.

author: hazelnout 17
text: Accessible & convenient location. Friendly staff & even better atmosphereü§© ‚Ä¶

author: peng lin Ang
text: Very small gym. Best to avoid from 6 to 9.30pm

author: tzen yi
text: Cosy small gym, avoid peak hours after 630pm.

author: Wendy Ha
text: Called and whatssap the contact but no answer. There is no staff at the gym as during their working hours.

author: Lee H
text: Small gym but gets the job done with friendly staff!

author: Fitri Yanti
text: Enjoy .. completely

author: code c
text: small place but friendly members and staff

author: Tariq Mohamed
text: Small gym and no toilet and bath facilities.

author: Satnam Singh
text: I want  to register but nobody picking up phone

author: Isaac Lai
text: great gym

author: Benjamin Chua
text: Crowded with foreign talents these days.

author: Dragon Slayer
text: Expensive

author: ‰æùÁê≥Eileen
text: The contact number nobody answer

author: Anthony Zarski
text: Gets the job done

author: Ruben James
text: Gd machines

author: Sam Ong
text: Good places to exercise

author: Ken Kwok
text: 24 hours

author: Clement Tan
text: Hi Clement, thank you for visiting our club. May I know if you have any feedback for us to improve your workout experience at Anytime Fitness Macpherson?

author: Rashid
text: Hi Rashid Arabath, thank you for your valuable review. Do you have any feedback for our club, services and facilities so that we can make our club a better place for your workout? Looking forward to hear from you. Thank you and have a nice day.

author: andy ng
text: Hi Andy, thank you for your valuable review. Is there any way that we can improve on our services and facilities to provide you with a better workout experience?
